record.dc:title: 24BT2, 15BT2, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Mound. Feature 13. Fire basin.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: The fire basin at this point has been almost entirely cleared out, except for a large white ash bed on the bottom, 1 1/2 feet in diameter and .25' thick. See also photos 23, 25, for other stages of development of this feature. View from east.
